Author: Duskyroses
Text: This post is so relatable!  I also haven’t hit my goal by the magical dates I had planned to.   But hey! 35 pounds in one year is amazing actually. Good for you! That’s incredible and you should be proud of yourself.   I also have trouble with how I want to be compared to others around me. I am naturally a little bit below average maybe, like BMI 20. But I have to be underweight I crave it so much. And I like being a tiny bit below my ugw so I can always have a buffer and be underweight.   Eds are stressful. Honestly, there will always be someone who is “goals” and we will never catch them, whether they are skinnier, curvier, or fitter. The best thing is finding a love for ourselves but it is really hard.
